title: Progress does not work on Windows using "Git Bash"
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?
Im using rclone via Git Bash to Sync Data from my PC to my Gdrive, if im using the -P Parameter im getting the following error:

> 2019/09/12 18:56:15 ERROR : Failed to start progress: windows terminal: initiali                                                                                                                                                                                            zation failed

if im using cmd instead of git bash everything works like it should 
but i pref git bash because i can simply use while loops etc.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

> rclone v1.49.2
> - os/arch: windows/amd64
> - go version: go1.12.3
> 

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

Windows 10, 64 bit

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

Google Drive

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
> ls -d * | while read x; do rclone sync "$x" "gdrive:/xyz/$x" -P; done


#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
`$ rclone sync -vv "zzz" "gdrive:/xyz/zzz" -P`

> 2019/09/12 19:09:50 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.49.2" starting with parameters ["C:\\rclone\\rclone.exe" "sync" "-vv" "zzz" "gdrive:/xyz/zzz" "-P"]
2019/09/12 19:09:50 DEBUG : Using config file from "C:\\Users\\xxx\\.config\\rclone\\rclone.conf"
2019/09/12 19:09:51 ERROR : Failed to start progress: windows terminal: initialization failed

multiple file checks 
> 2019/09/12 19:09:51 DEBUG : xxx: Size and modification time the same (differ by -487.9Âµs, within tolerance 1ms)
2019/09/12 19:09:51 DEBUG : xxx: Unchanged skipping

`2019/09/12 19:09:52 INFO  : Google drive root 'xyz/zzz': Waiting for checks to finish`

> 2019/09/12 19:09:52 DEBUG : 11 go routines active
2019/09/12 19:09:52 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.49.2" finishing with parameters ["C:\\rclone\\rclone.exe" "sync" "-vv" "zzz" "gdrive:/xyz/zzz" "-P"]
